[DQC.US.0133.9832] The filer has reported a value for the element us-gaap:AssetsCurrent with a value of 585,200,000 using the axis ScheduleOfEquityMethodInvestmentEquityMethodInvesteeNameAxis. This axis must be not be used when reporting a value for us-gaap:AssetsCurrent. The filer should use the axis EquityMethodInvestmentNonconsolidatedInvesteeAxis without the axis ScheduleOfEquityMethodInvestmentEquityMethodInvesteeNameAxis. Please refer to the FASB implementation guide on Dimensional Modeling for Disclosures of Consolidated and Nonconsolidated Entities on the FASB website.
The properties of this us-gaap:AssetsCurrent fact are: Period :2020-12-31 Dimensions : srt:ScheduleOfEquityMethodInvestmentEquityMethodInvesteeNameAxis=val:AROMember Unit : USD
Rule Element Id:9832 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/314808/000031480822000011/val-20211231.htm 4

[DQC.US.0135.9835] The element us-gaap:NetPeriodicDefinedBenefitsExpenseReversalOfExpenseExcludingServiceCostComponent has been used in the filing but does not appear in the financial statements of the filing. This disclosure should appear in the face financials unless it is included in another account caption. If this is the case the following element(s) us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanNetPeriodicBenefitCostCreditExcludingServiceCostStatementOfIncomeOrComprehensiveIncomeExtensibleList should be used to identify the account where the financial statement element us-gaap:NetPeriodicDefinedBenefitsExpenseReversalOfExpenseExcludingServiceCostComponent is included. In the case of pension elements the element DefinedBenefitPlanNetPeriodicBenefitCostCreditExcludingServiceCostStatementOfIncomeOrComprehensiveIncomeExtensibleList can be used as a catch all for those cases where a company indicates that all pension costs are included in a specific line item on the financial statements.
The following is an example of a fact that does not have an extensible list.
Concept : us-gaap:NetPeriodicDefinedBenefitsExpenseReversalOfExpenseExcludingServiceCostComponent Value : -5,400,000 Period : 2021-01-01 to 2021-04-30 Dimensions : Unit : USD Decimals: -5
Rule Element Id:9835 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/314808/000031480822000011/val-20211231.htm 4

[DQC.US.0135.9835] The element us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanAmortizationOfGainsLosses has been used in the filing but does not appear in the financial statements of the filing. This disclosure should appear in the face financials unless it is included in another account caption. If this is the case the following element(s) us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanNetPeriodicBenefitCostCreditAmortizationOfGainLossStatementOfIncomeOrComprehensiveIncomeExtensibleList,DefinedBenefitPlanNetPeriodicBenefitCostCreditExcludingServiceCostStatementOfIncomeOrComprehensiveIncomeExtensibleList should be used to identify the account where the financial statement element us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanAmortizationOfGainsLosses is included. In the case of pension elements the element DefinedBenefitPlanNetPeriodicBenefitCostCreditExcludingServiceCostStatementOfIncomeOrComprehensiveIncomeExtensibleList can be used as a catch all for those cases where a company indicates that all pension costs are included in a specific line item on the financial statements.
The following is an example of a fact that does not have an extensible list.
Concept : us-gaap:DefinedBenefitPlanAmortizationOfGainsLosses Value : 100,000 Period : 2021-01-01 to 2021-04-30 Dimensions : Unit : USD Decimals: -5
Rule Element Id:9835 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/314808/000031480822000011/val-20211231.htm 4

[DQC.US.0135.9835] The element us-gaap:FairValueAssetsMeasuredOnRecurringBasisChangeInUnrealizedGainLoss has been used in the filing but does not appear in the financial statements of the filing. This disclosure should appear in the face financials unless it is included in another account caption. If this is the case the following element(s) us-gaap:FairValueAssetRecurringBasisStillHeldUnrealizedGainLossStatementOfIncomeExtensibleList should be used to identify the account where the financial statement element us-gaap:FairValueAssetsMeasuredOnRecurringBasisChangeInUnrealizedGainLoss is included.
The following is an example of a fact that does not have an extensible list.
Concept : us-gaap:FairValueAssetsMeasuredOnRecurringBasisChangeInUnrealizedGainLoss Value : 5,000,000 Period : 2019-01-01 to 2019-12-31 Dimensions : us-gaap:RetirementPlanTypeAxis=us-gaap:SupplementalEmployeeRetirementPlanDefinedBenefitMember Unit : USD Decimals: -5
Rule Element Id:9835 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/314808/000031480822000011/val-20211231.htm 4
